version_description: Just in time for the party season: we’ve improved the speed of the app to help you shop new styles faster. Get it or regret it! Also new to the app: don’t forget to check out the weekly editor’s picks.
You can now change currencies in the boohoo app! The app is available for UK, US and Australia. Dive in now to shop the latest arrivals.
You can now add items to bag directly from wish list. The app is available for UK, US and Australia. Dive in now to shop the latest arrivals.
If you’re in the United States then we’ve got good news for you! We’ve just improved the checkout to make it easier for you to shop. You’re welcome.
We're working on making the boohoo.com app even better. Stay tuned for more updates and a brand new shopping experience!

We’ve made it even easier to shop with boohoo! Login to your account and shop your wish list across your devices. We’ve also made the boring part of the checkout faster with Touch ID so you can look flame in no time.
You can now shop faster and easier with our new PayPal option at checkout.
We've made some bug fixes!
We sorted out some of those pesky bugs for you!
We sorted out some of those pesky bugs for you!
Bugs, bye! Our app is shining bright, day or night –  shop, go out, show off.
Serving you some sweet bug fixes right here.
That feeling when the bugs have been kicked out of the app.
Ready, set, refresh. We’ve taken care of those bugs for you.
Serving you some sweet bug fixes right here.
Our brand new app is here! What are you waiting for? Get shopping girl!
Our brand new app is here! What are you waiting for? Get shopping girl!
Our brand new app is here! What are you waiting for? Get shopping girl!
Our brand new app is here! What are you waiting for? Get shopping girl!
Bug fixes and performance improvements to make your shopping experience smoother.

We’re here to make you ‘appy and so we have taken care of some bugs that were standing between you and your new ‘drobe. We also used the opportunity to make small improvements to the app for a seamless shopping experience.
We've given our app some TLC so you can enjoy a seamless app experience. While we were at it, we've fixed bugs and made small improvements so you can sit back and relax when shopping with us.

Appy days ahead. You can now use Klarna on the app. While we were at it, we've done some behind the scenes tinkering, fixed bugs and made small improvements so you can sit back and relax when shopping with us.
You can now use Klarna on the app. And while we were feeling festive, we've fixed bugs and made small improvements to make it easier for you to bring the sparkle this season.
Breaking news…we've been busy fixing bugs and making some behind the scenes improvements to the app. Shopping just got way sweeter!
Oh, this little update! It's a Spring thing. We've fixed bugs and made improvements to make it even easier for you to shop your new ‘drobe.
Why, hello there! Our app has had a little makeover and we squished some bugs, to make it even easier for you to shop with us. Love, boohoo x
We've been busy fixing bugs and making improvements to our app. Need new? We've got you covered, babe! Love, boohoo x

Thanks, it's new! We've given our app some TLC, fixed bugs and made improvements just for you, including revamping our notifications. And we've made it even easier for you to check out with Apple Pay. Love, boohoo x
We're making it app-en! We've been busy fixing bugs and making small improvements for you. Stay tuned to see what exciting changes are coming your way on our app. Love, boohoo x
We're making it app-en! We've been busy fixing bugs and making small improvements for you. Stay tuned to see what exciting changes are coming your way on our app. Love, boohoo x

A fresh little update with bug fixes, improvements to your experience and our favourite: introducing new ways of serving you even more of your favourite fashion fix right at your fingertips. Love, boohoo x

A fresh little update with bug fixes, improvements to your experience and our favourite: introducing new ways of serving you even more of your favourite fashion fix right at your fingertips. Love, boohoo x
Bug fixes and improvements ready for iOS 14
We're bringing you mini but mighty bug fixes and improvements! Update now and shop the clothes that move you. Love, boohoo x

We've spent our summer fixing bugs, making small improvements, and working on new ways to bring you your new fashion heroes straight to your fingertips without any hassle. You can thank us later. Love, boohoo x
Your wardrobe upgrade is here. We're bringing you bug fixes, performance improvements and the freshest content straight to your fingertips. Love, boohoo x
Your wardrobe upgrade is here. We're bringing you bug fixes, performance improvements and the freshest content straight to your fingertips. Love, boohoo x
Shiny, 'appy and new. Update now for the latest bug fixes, performance improvements and level up your wardrobe game for 2021. Love, boohoo x
Shiny, 'appy and new. Update now for the latest bug fixes, performance improvements and level up your wardrobe game for 2021. Love, boohoo x
Time to transition! Update now for the latest bug fixes and performance improvements. We are working on some exciting new content for you so keep your eyes peeled for the next update. Love, boohoo x
It's an 'appy vibe! Get the latest update which includes bug fixes and performance improvements for an effortless shopping experience. Love, boohoo x
Hello Spring! We're bringing you bug fixes and performance improvements so you can get new season ready in a breeze. Plus, we've added a new payment option for you. Love, boohoo x
When it's a new season and our app update brings you performance improvements and bug fixes. Shopping new 'fits to make memories in has never been so easy. Love, boohoo x
